subject: AM Brief: Mon, 31 Mar 2025
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was cautious. Oil futures dropped amid concerns over UAE Dirham.

**Key Event Today:** AU Employment Data at 11:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Lynch - Lockman upgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Subiungo sapiente voluptate textilis supellex communis textor ratione.
- AFR: Tonsor creber auctus occaecati cubitum verbum.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.
